channel.title: work on PSWU
channel.description: Recent content in work on PSWU

item.title: Surviving an unexpected layoff.
item.description: Since I started working in 2010, I’ve had bad times, but I was luckily never laid off. Thanks to Covid-19, the ongoing war, all the tech companies out there that constantly tell us how bad our economy is, and perhaps some unknown reasons (if I could ever know), I lost my job - for the first time in my life. To be fair, I’ve imagined this could happen when I chose a career at early-stage startups.
